name: nativescript-oauth2
description: OAuth 2 generic authorization plugin for NativeScript that doesn't install third party native libraries

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.test.android-angular: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-angular && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios-angular: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-angular && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.test.android-custom: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-custom-provider && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios-angular-custom: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-custom-provider && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ios-angular: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android-angular: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ios-vue: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle --emulator
scripts.demo.android-vue: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle --emulator
scripts.demo.ios-custom: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-custom-provider && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android-custom: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-custom-provider && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-vue.reset: cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-custom-provider.reset: cd ../demo-custom-provider && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-oauth2 && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npm run demo-vue.reset && npm run demo-custom-provider.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
